main event: A bright light was observed above the horizon moving rapidly and changing course in Ganado, Arizona on January 29, 1962.
interesting points: The object changed size and intensity during observation, moving at incredible speeds with no visible smoke or trail., The sighting lasted for approximately one minute., Witnesses reported that the object appeared triangular in shape., It was initially thought to be an aircraft but displayed unusual maneuvering., Observers expressed a belief that the object was likely not of earthly origin due to its speed and behavior.
witness description: The observer described the object as solid and metallic without lights or sound.
